title: Tanshon
body: Tanshonb has long been used as a location for various settlements throughout the ages. During The Age of Races, the city of Javasama was built on its Western side. Later, during The Age of Empires, Mant Kuzzo built Gor'java, a great fortress, upon its Eastern slope. Finally, after numerous settlements converged, the city of Mutasaih was established to the South of the mountain.
preface: Tanshon is the lone mountain that lies in the centre of the Inditt Region. It is a tip of the extensive mountain range that has long been buried under the desert sand.
